description:
Ten years ago, Yoshiko met Akuru. Childhood friends, the kid next door, the old
cliché story, shattered into a million pieces with the tragedy which unfolds.
Young Akuru seeks the power to defeat Yoshiko, surpassing his limits out of
fear. What is born in the young Akuru`s heart?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aho Girl ! Une rencontre... oui, mais pas que !
出会い... そして! アホガール
